word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重双方静止地面对面，或指指充满勇气、信心和决心正视人或事。
通常指遇到困难或挫折，也指偶然或意外地相遇。
普通用词，本义指双方或多方从不同方向或相反方向作相对运动，最终相碰(遇)。
多指通过书信、电话或直接会面和别人联系。口语用词。
不可避免的，面对面的相遇。也指敢于正视困难或问题的决心和信心。

word_group.brief_definition: 与不明飞行物假想近距离接触
血腥的遭遇战；激烈的交锋；残酷的对决

bilingual.source: Make sure to log any issues you encounter.
bilingual.target: 确保记录你遇到的任何问题。
运动员们经常会遇到伤病问题。

bilingual.source: I encounter many challenges at work every day.
bilingual.target: 我每天在工作中遇到许多挑战。

bilingual.source: When you travel, you encounter many new things.
bilingual.target: 旅行时，你会遇到许多新事物。

bilingual.source: Rename the exe if you encounter any issues.
bilingual.target: 如果遇到问题，请重命名exe文件。

bilingual.source: We often encounter unexpected situations in life.
bilingual.target: 我们经常在生活中遇到意外情况。

bilingual.source: She encounter a problem with her computer this morning.
bilingual.target: 她今天早上遇到了电脑问题。

bilingual.source: She did not encounter any difficulties in her studies.
bilingual.target: 她在学习中没有遇到任何困难。

bilingual.source: Farmers often encounter calcrete when digging wells.
bilingual.target: 农民在挖井时经常会遇到钙质结壳。

bilingual.source: When traveling, we might encounter cultural conflict.
bilingual.target: 旅游时，我们可能会遇到文化冲突。

list.abstract: encounter（英 [ɪnˈkaʊntə]，美 [ɪnˈkaʊntər]），英语单词，作动词用，为遇到；面临；偶然遇见。作名词用，为邂逅；偶然的遇见；冲突。短语搭配有close encounter（与不明飞行物假想近距离接触），例句为“You should be chatting with the strangers you encounter.（你应该和你遇到的陌生人聊天。）” encounter及物动词类近义词有confront，名词类近义词有fell in with、lit on，不及物动词类近义词有bring up against、run into。encounters是encounter的复数形式。
encounter+是网络上相识的“流歌”和“桃梨”两人的同人音乐组合，配合独特的世界观进行原创的音乐创作。曲风多变，目标是非encounter+制作不出来的独一无二的乐曲。

yingyinNormal.en: We progress forward until we encounter setbacks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们前进时会遇到挫折。

yingyinNormal.en: The faster our spaceships, the greater the gravity fields we encounter, the further out of sync we may become with those we leave behind.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们的宇宙飞船飞得越快，我们遇到的引力场就越大，我们就可能变得和落在后面的东西就越不同步。

yingyinNormal.en: In your travels, did you ever encounter a man named Khan?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你的经历中，有没有碰见一个叫可汗的?

yingyinNormal.en: Lay the groundwork. Keep a journal of every incident of ageism you encounter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 做好前期的准备工作，记下每一件你觉得是在歧视老年人的事。

yingyinNormal.en: A subtle alteration of how a plant looked and a chance encounter with a curious beetle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为这不过是一株植物恰巧变了模样，又恰巧被好奇的昆虫遇上。

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, Mr. Ephraham, don't you mean that there might be slight variations in a road encounter, and that's all?
yingyinNormal.zh: 以法连先生您是不是想说，路面的状况总会有一些细微的差别，仅此而已？

yingyinNormal.en: Step two is to encounter the problems that stand in the way of getting to your goals. These problems are typically painful.
yingyinNormal.zh: 第二步直面挡在你追寻路上的问题。这些问题一般很难办。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey. We're, going to the movies. No, we're not. We're standing in the hallway, suffering through an awkward encounter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嘿。我们赶着去看电影。才怪，我们站在走廊里忍受你们尴尬的相遇。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you change your mind about him based on this second encounter, or do you go with your first impression and write him off?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会改变你对他的印象吗？根据你们第二次相遇，还是你依旧相信你的第一印象？

yingyinNormal.en: Friends and family, yours, enemies, strangers in every argument in every encounter, every exchange, I will tell you, they all want to know one thing: Was that okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们的亲友、敌人、陌生人，在每次争论时，在每次的相遇与交流时，他们都想知道的是：我表现得还可以吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Because every experience encounter, and particularly your mistakes, are there to teach you and force you into being more who you are. And then figure out what is the next right move.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为，所有的经验，尤其是你的失误，都会让你学到东西，促使你找回自我，然后确定下一步该何去何从。

yingyinNormal.en: All of these different machines evolve together through time to produce the realities we encounter every day. And I realized that I was just one tiny bit in one nanosecond, deciding what I should do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有不同的机器逐渐共同演化产生了我们每日的现实。我在决定该怎么做时意识到自己只是一毫秒中的一点。

yingyinNormal.en: As I was saying, you and Leonard had a disappointing sexual encounter. Earlier this evening, Leonard characterized as just fine. So what you're seeing here is a continuation of the mocking that followed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 言归正传，你和莱纳德的性爱比较失望。今天傍晚，莱纳德将其描述为“挺好”，所以你看到的只是嘲笑的后续篇。

yingyinNormal.en: One way to think about the anchors is that it's the first time we encounter a price, it's the first time we think about the particular decision, and that way of thinking about the decision sticks with us for a long time.
yingyinNormal.zh: “锚”其实是指我们第一次遇见的价格，第一次思考并作出决定购买的价格，往后会长时间影响我们。

yingyinNormal.en: But no matter what challenges or setbacks or disappointment that you may encounter along the way, you will find true success and happiness, if you have only one goal, there really is only one, and that is this: To fulfill the highest most truthful expression of yourself, as a human being.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但无论你们会在日后遭遇任何的挑战、挫折与失意，如果你明确了一个目标，就会找到真正的成功与快乐，而真正的目标只有一个，那就是：作为人类，去实现真正的自我。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: unexpectedly experience or be faced with something difficult or hostile

examination_example.sentence: After <highlight>encountering</highlight> several setbacks, Lucas decided to use a drill, and his innovations created the modern oil drilling industry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在经历了几次挫折后，卢卡斯决定使用钻机，他的创新创造了现代石油钻井业。

examination_example.sentence: Like many visionaries, the young scientist <highlight>encountered</highlight> numerous skeptics.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像许多有远见的人一样，这位年轻的科学家遇到了无数的怀疑者。

examination_example.sentence: The second is that the criticism will help the organization, making sure employees of the future are less likely to <highlight>encounter</highlight> what I did.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二，这些批评将有助于组织，确保未来的员工不太可能遇到我所做的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Why does a negative <highlight>encounter</highlight> with strangers stick in one's memory?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么与陌生人的负面接触会留在一个人的记忆中？

examination_example.sentence: You may occasionally have a negative <highlight>encounter</highlight> that might stick in your memory.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能偶尔会有一次负面的遭遇，这可能会留在你的记忆中。

examination_example.sentence: In 62 <highlight>encounters</highlight>, fewer than one-third disclosed clinicians' credential or let patients choose; only 32% discussed potential side effects of prescribed medications.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在62次会面中，只有不到三分之一的人透露了临床医生的身份或让患者选择；只有32%的人讨论了处方药的潜在副作用。

sense_info_list.zh: 偶然碰到; 意外遇见; 与...邂逅

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Anyone who considers river time in relation to atomic time will <highlight>encounter</highlight> a major imbalance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何考虑将河流时间与原子时间联系起来的人都会遇到严重的失衡。

examination_example.sentence: Making the best of this close <highlight>encounter</highlight> (相遇), I took some pictures of the bear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 充分利用这次近距离相遇，我拍了一些熊的照片。
